item.title: Enormous pothole on side of road, 28th January
item.description:
URGENT enormous very deep pothole on side of road half way between the house and farm opposite o gate On left hand side as heading towards the readings Been there a while now and just getting bigger
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
